name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. David William HALWICK, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Halwick

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. David William HALWICK, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 3rd day of September, 1998, there having been filed with this Court by David William Halwick his verified Statement of Resignation dated July 30, 1998, stating that he desires to resign from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of David William Halwick be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
716 A.2d 1245
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. David William HALWICK, Respondent.
Nos. 454 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 3, 1998.
